name: agentswarm
description: Generative AI system to build an agent swarm for task and problem solving

scripts.start:backend: bash -c 'scripts/check-port.sh 8000 "FastAPI Backend" && source .venv/bin/activate && cd backend && python main.py'
scripts.start:frontend: bash -c 'scripts/check-port.sh 5173 "Vite Frontend" && cd frontend && npm install > /dev/null && npm run dev'
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
